it.polimi.se2018.controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.controller.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observer<MessageVC>

    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observer<MessageVC>
    class Controller contains all method for the manage of the game
    Author:
    Samuele Guida

                       int numberRound,
                       int row,
                       int column,
                       Dice diceRound)
        Parameters:
        title - of the card
        diceStock - a chosen dice from the stock

        column - column's coordinate on the map where the chosen dice to be positioned
        diceRound - a chosen dice from the Round Scheme

                          int rowDest,
                          int columnDest)
        Parameters:

        dice - chose dice
        rowDest - row's coordinate on the map where the dice should be placed

      • manageTap

        public void manageTap(java.lang.String title,
                      int row1Mit,
                      int row2Mit,
                      int col1Mit,
                      int col2Mit,
                      Dice diceRoundScheme,
                      int row1Dest,
                      int column1Dest,
                      java.util.ArrayList<Dice> diceToMove,
                      int row2Dest,
                      int column2Dest,
                      int posDiceinSchemeRound)
        Parameters:
        title - of a card
        diceRoundScheme - a chosen dice from the Round Scheme
        row1Dest - row's coordinate on the map where the first chosen dice to be positioned
        column1Dest - column's coordinate on the map where the first chosen dice to be positioned
        diceToMove - an array list of the dices to be moved
        row2Dest - row's coordinate on the map where the second chosen dice to be positioned (off if numDicesToMove=1)
        column2Dest - column's coordinate on the map where the second chosen dice to be positioned (off if numDicesToMove=1)
        posDiceinSchemeRound - which round contains the dice on the round scheme
        row1Mit - the row's coordinate of the first dice to be repositioned
        row2Mit - the row's coordinate of the second dice to be repositioned
        col1Mit - the column's coordinate of the first dice to be repositioned
        col2Mit - the column's coordinate of the second dice to be repositioned
